abstract: General Electric is hoping to make a big splash at the Olympics and prove that the company’s creativity is translating into big sales in the developing world.
snippet: General Electric is hoping to make a big splash at the Olympics and prove that the company’s creativity is translating into big sales in the developing world.
lead_paragraph: SO, how do you say “Imagination at Work” in Chinese?

headline.main: To G.E., a Chinese Olympics Is Just Made for a Global Message
headline.print_headline: To G.E., a Chinese Olympics Is Just Made for a Global Message
